titleStmt.title: The speeches of Sr. Benjamin Rudyer in the high Court of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Rudyerd, Benjamin, Sir, 1572-1658.

notesStmt.note: Composed of three speeches. The second and third speeches, Thomason E.196[3] and Thomason E.196[4], both bear the caption title: "Another speech of Sr. Benjamin Rudyer in the High Court of Parliament".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "the first was spoken. novemb. 7th 1640"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
